docs.summary:
A [quick action bar](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-the-quick-action-bar-on-your-mobile-site)
 helps your visitors contact you instantly from their mobile devices. You can
 choose which actions appear on it and customize the design to match your site.

srcDocs.summary:
A [quick action bar](https://support.wix.com/en/article/adding-and-setting-up-the-quick-action-bar-on-your-mobile-site)
 helps your visitors contact you instantly from their mobile devices. You can
 choose which actions appear on it and customize the design to match your site.

docs.summary: Sets or gets a quick action bar's alignment.
description: Setting the `alignment` property to `"right"` shows the quick action bar on
the right side of the user's device. Setting it to `"left"` shows it on the
left side.
Getting the `alignment` property returns whether the quick action bar is shown
on the left or right side of the user's device.

examples.title: Set the quick action bar alignment
Get the quick action bar alignment

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets a quick action bar's alignment.
description: Setting the `alignment` property to `"right"` shows the quick action bar on
the right side of the user's device. Setting it to `"left"` shows it on the
left side.
Getting the `alignment` property returns whether the quick action bar is shown
on the left or right side of the user's device.

examples.title: Set the quick action bar alignment
Get the quick action bar alignment

notes: Only vertical quick action bar designs support the `alignment` property.

docs.summary: Sets or gets a quick action bar's color scheme.
description: One of:
+ `"grey"` - Buttons are grey.
+ `"black"` - Buttons are black.
+ `"colors"` - Buttons are various colors.

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets a quick action bar's color scheme.
description: One of:
+ `"grey"` - Buttons are grey.
+ `"black"` - Buttons are black.
+ `"brand"` - Buttons are various colors.

docs.summary: Sets or gets whether a quick action bar's color scheme is inverted.
description: Setting the `invertColorScheme` property to `true` applies the quick action
bar's colors to the bar's background. Setting it to `false` applies the colors
to the bar's icons.
Getting the `invertColorScheme` property returns whether the color scheme is
inverted or not.

examples.title: Set whether the color scheme is inverted
Get whether the color scheme is inverted

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets whether a quick action bar's color scheme is inverted.
description: Setting the `invertColorScheme` property to `true` applies the quick action
bar's colors to the bar's background. Setting it to `false` applies the colors
to the bar's icons.
Getting the `invertColorScheme` property returns whether the color scheme is
inverted or not.

examples.title: Set whether the color scheme is inverted
Get whether the color scheme is inverted

docs.summary: Sets or gets whether a quick action bar's labels are shown.
description: Setting the `showLabels` property to `true` shows labels along with the icons
in the quick action bar. Setting it to `false` hides the labels.
Getting the `showLabels` property returns whether the labels are shown or not.

examples.title: Set whether the labels are shown
Get whether the labels are shown

srcDocs.summary: Sets or gets whether a quick action bar's labels are shown.
description: Setting the `showLabels` property to `true` shows labels along with the icons
in the quick action bar. Setting it to `false` hides the labels.
Getting the `showLabels` property returns whether the labels are shown or not.

examples.title: Set whether the labels are shown
Get whether the labels are shown

params.name: handler
params.doc:
The name of the
 function or the function expression to run when a quick action bar item is
 clicked.
params.srcDoc:
The name of the
 function or the function expression to run when a quick action bar item is
 clicked.

ret.doc: The quick action bar that triggered the event.
ret.srcDoc: The quick action bar that triggered the event.

docs.summary:
Adds an event handler that runs when an item in a quick action bar is
 clicked.

srcDocs.summary:
Adds an event handler that runs when an item in a quick action bar is
 clicked.

examples.title: Get the information of the item that was clicked

notes: **Deprecation note:** The $w parameter of event handlers is being deprecated. To get a scoped selector, use the $w.at() function and pass it the context property of the event parameter: $item = $w.at(event.context). To learn more, see here.
